questionList.question: Як створити акаунт Slotsbet?
questionList.answer: All you have to do to get started is click the “Registration” button and fill in all the fields. Then you get a verification email with a link.

questionList.question: Can I have more than one account?
questionList.answer: No. All details on Terms & Conditions.

questionList.question: Can I change my registered email address?
How do I add another currency to my account?
questionList.answer: Go to your account and choose "Wallet". Click on "+" and choose the currency that you prefer.
